data.text:
We must win the race to limit climate change. 
@antonioguterres will invite global leaders to September's Climate Summit to increase #ClimateAction. https://t.co/roJjv8h4Kq https://t.co/7CgGi12rsv

Al-Shabaab still biggest source of insecurity in Somalia, top UN official tells Security Council, days after attacks on @UNSomalia compound in Mogadishu. https://t.co/RGgNsiGlI1 https://t.co/LcPG9wLP2f
.@WHO and @UNPeacekeeping colleagues in Democratic Republic of the Congo are responding to Ebola outbreak that has sickened 600 people. https://t.co/nrHVO18xqH ⬇️ https://t.co/JX09mSUCzE

For 70+ years, @UNESCO has been promoting dialogue among civilizations, cultures & peoples and has worked for freedom of expression and the protection of cultural heritage. More on their work ➡️ https://t.co/UDOU84VhDJ https://t.co/EpbWMM6r4I

#TBT to last month when Sir David Attenborough delivered the People's Seat address at the UN Climate Conference #COP24 in Poland. Find out how you can join him in taking #ClimateAction 👉 https://t.co/zTkumwytsA https://t.co/JjXZ6g0pda
Looking to make a difference this year but don't know how? Get ideas from our Lazy Person's Guide to Saving the World: https://t.co/uE8W7SQcIE  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/opgWKufgoX

In a 🌍 where we produce enough food to feed everyone, 821M people go to bed hungry every night. The #GlobalGoals are working to change that. Learn about Goal 2 #ZeroHunger 👉 https://t.co/ix7Sb01BnA https://t.co/o62pIYO3E7
A new year means big changes in how the UN is doing business. See what reform efforts are underway: https://t.co/ym7BwzSQqZ https://t.co/1z5K8H4kQu

.@antonioguterres strongly condemns Tuesday's attacks against the @UNSomalia compound in Mogadishu, stressing that the UN will continue to support the people & Government of Somalia in building peace & stability. https://t.co/Pm0nEaBLYQ

"Don't ever hate each other."

70 years after the adoption of the #PreventGenocide Convention, the stories of Holocaust survivors are being shared in new ways thanks to @USCShoahFdn https://t.co/6C4tlSG77l #StrongerThanHate https://t.co/0TGFKq5WGI

💪Exercise regularly
🍎Eat healthy
😴Get 8 hours of sleep each night 
🍺Reduce alcohol consumption 
👥Express your feelings

More mental health tips for 2019 from @pahowho: https://t.co/QEOIj3Nhkf https://t.co/DwZ0bLVIjb
In 2019, @ILO is celebrating its 100th anniversary – making it the oldest  UN specialized agency. Learn more: https://t.co/n7VNPfb18F #GlobalGoals #ILO100 https://t.co/ey9amF2p0u
As you start a new year, check out these 12 tips to be healthy & get info on a range of health topics from @WHO: https://t.co/Gxu2j0zH0P https://t.co/gSUyrF8EAU
Tuesday: @RDMISIONONU takes on rotating Security Council presidency for the month of January: https://t.co/pu5YTGr83O https://t.co/1CyaxeaFxe

“In 2019, the United Nations will continue to bring people together to build bridges and create space for solutions." -- @antonioguterres' New Year's message. https://t.co/mAfmvXvuTr https://t.co/dVfS5w5Q51
#HappyNewYear from the #SocialUN Team! Wishing all our followers a happy and peaceful 2019 🕊️ https://t.co/6OgubasSoX
The UNHQ complex in NYC is closed to visitors on Monday 1 January, but the work of the UN continues around the 🌎. See what we do: https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/UnNpYYQA1R

Welcome to the Security Council

🇧🇪 @BelgiumUN
🇩🇪 @GermanyUN
🇮🇩 @indonesiaunny
🇩🇴 @RDMISIONONU
🇿🇦 @SAMissionNY

who begin their 2-year term in January. https://t.co/EOk6rUqLwi https://t.co/fAfPLZVhsk

Happy New Year and best wishes for 2019 from around the UN System! 

https://t.co/lX4UPSdpSI

Thank you for your work on international peace & security during your 2-year term on the Security Council to @Bolivia_ONU 🇧🇴, @Ethiopia_UN 🇪🇹, @Kazakh_Mission 🇰🇿, @NLatUN 🇳🇱 and @SwedenUN 🇸🇪 https://t.co/h1thTceLhj
Out celebrating this #NewYearsEve? Drive safely! Never drink and drive, always wear your seatbelt. https://t.co/2h6gUDfe00

The UN Security Council works all year round to maintain international peace and security. Get details and updates on the Council's work from its new website: https://t.co/QQ1iJdyqXo https://t.co/pkLDiLV8hV

Special thanks to our friends in 🇹🇷 at @GoodrollTR for creating this special filter. 

Respond with a photo or video & say #HappyNewYear in your own language. 

Also, send a @Snap to your friends to say you support #globalgoals in 2019. https://t.co/HtkJzoxLvO

Check out this special UN #HappyNewYear @Snapchat filter - only available for 48 hours - and follow "united-nations" on Snapchat for updates and behind-the-scenes snaps all year round. https://t.co/LlFRTAVmOL https://t.co/qdrMCicSkb
Everybody has a role to play in achieving the #GlobalGoals by 2030. Here is how you can take action for a happy and sustainable new year: https://t.co/JHoTkYaMtX https://t.co/JHpgug1frT

Over 90% of all farms are run by families, and these family farms produce 80% of the world's food. @FAO has more details on the Int'l Decade of Family Farming which is about to begin: https://t.co/FFyX9ibIvb https://t.co/QddpI473hm
2019 is the Int'l Year of Moderation and the Int'l Year of the Periodic Table of Chemical Elements. @UNESCO has the details: https://t.co/llNn3Ph3i3 https://t.co/Cv3X0wmovS

Indigenous languages are important for development, peace building, reconciliation & more. Details about the International Year of Indigenous Languages 2019 ➡️ https://t.co/Jr2KZYetMR #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/TMq6SkWHIv

“One child,🧒
one teacher,👩‍🏫
one book,📓
one pen🖊️
can change the world." -- UN Messenger of Peace @Malala

The #GlobalGoals aim to achieve quality education for all: https://t.co/J9YZ46t3QP https://t.co/B9dDlT7FWL

In March, Dutch artist @SRoosegaarde’s “Waterlicht” immersed viewers at UNHQ in a virtual flood on #WorldWaterDay - showing how water levels could rise if we don't take urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/sJNyOO6L9P #ThisHappened https://t.co/DeJNuVQGyW
You want to help save the planet but don’t know how? https://t.co/zTkumwgS40 is the new tool to help people around the 🌍 take #ClimateAction every day. https://t.co/SoEmQSpngg

📷: A Peacekeeper from China #ServingForPeace with @UNPeacekeeping in Liberia greets children a few days before @UNMILNews completed its mandate in March. More 2018 @UN_Photo highlights: https://t.co/vVoaN2ecjy #ThisHappened https://t.co/3QjnLMz3Hu

"This victory is a recognition of the rights of indigenous peoples" -- Joênia Wapichana of Brazil is one of the winners of the 2018 @UNHumanRights Prize. https://t.co/WVdd5NaS3k #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/Oeyq62YGLl

At #COP24 cellist & activist @bensollee explained why he ditched his 🚙 for a 🚲 and peddled close to 100,000 kilometres in support of #ClimateAction. Find out in our latest podcast 🎧: https://t.co/K8aYbzoVt7 https://t.co/pkX6sUlL8Y

"In these times of growing political divides and intractable conflicts, we need the peacemaking spirit of Kofi Annan more than ever." -- @antonioguterres on the loss of @KofiAnnan in August. More memorable images of the former Secretary-General ➡️ https://t.co/YgwXXTFzv8 https://t.co/dNvuPd7IU9
Uganda now hosts more refugees than any other country in Africa. @Refugees continues to provide life-saving assistance and support. https://t.co/geQQQNWL4E https://t.co/RofITVn3GB

Gender Equality
#ClimateAction
Human Rights
#GlobalGoals
Peacekeeping

Some of our @Twitter highlights of the year #ThisHappened

https://t.co/OENbj5JaS4

Conflict, hunger and disease forced nearly 700,000 people from their homes in South Sudan in 2017. Follow one family’s journey in search of safety. https://t.co/CosVzGNUY5 #WithRefugees https://t.co/NJqGAMXDuJ
Thanks to @VisitUN tour guides for their help with this new video series! Get answers to all your UN questions when you #VisitUN ➡️ https://t.co/kRY5hpoXqM
In 2018 @UN_Women welcomed 3 new Goodwill Ambassadors to the UN family: Marta Vieira da Silva ⚽ @DanaiGurira 🎥 and @JahaENDFGM https://t.co/qxAd111IZV #equalitymilestones https://t.co/jXB3OmGSlE
Many thanks to all our UN Safety & Security colleagues - both human & canine 🐶 - for working all year round to keep us save. https://t.co/5nj94qxDJ9 https://t.co/RZPcGoy1Jg
From Afghanistan to Somalia - and many places in between - @UN_DPA is working on mediation, conflict prevention & resolution. A look back at 2018 ➡️ https://t.co/Y8myaeoCAL https://t.co/fKTnnKA5JQ

"Migration can be a catalyst for economic growth." --- @UNMigration Director, Ashraf El Nour explains to @africarenewal what Africa can gain from the Global Compact #ForMigration: https://t.co/DuG1uLck7Y https://t.co/LxFgkKICNm
2019 will bring new global challenges. The UN is key to bringing countries together to find global solutions: https://t.co/MGT7G5uPFL #GlobalGoals https://t.co/YftXE4RJ4k

700+ million people still live in extreme poverty & are struggling to fulfill their basic needs like health, education & access to water. Learn how the #GlobalGoals aim to end poverty: https://t.co/dUdiGW1PIR https://t.co/YgjwiJUfrL
Does the UN help create peace? - It may not always make the headlines, but the UN works to prevent conflict, keep the peace & protect people every day. https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/PI9DZ7ZGGw

"The fashion industry has a huge impact." -- Stefan Seidel from @Puma about the launch of the Fashion Industry Charter for #ClimateAction at #COP24 earlier this month. https://t.co/btmI8pVKGO

 https://t.co/Gply6LWyjF

As 2018 comes to a close, @UN_women is looking back at stories from some of the women who rose against injustice, defied stereotypes and inspired us all this year: https://t.co/Kq6XAkeYte https://t.co/ssXIw6M2EG

The UN works for everyone, everywhere, every day of the year by
#ServingForPeace
and working for 
#ZeroHunger
#GlobalGoals
#CleanSeas
#ClimateAction 

#WithRefugees & #ForMigration
Details: https://t.co/gjJwuPLyES https://t.co/PtJvdSmJL7

Nurses are #NotATarget!
Doctors are #NotATarget!
Hospitals are #NotATarget!

Yet, health care workers, facilities & transports were attacked over 700 times in 2017. https://t.co/ctwZexVEpU #InvestinHumanity https://t.co/YAJuasGWJH

UN reform means more opportunities to better-serve the 🌍 and many exciting new job openings. See what's being done to create a more efficient & effective UN: https://t.co/ym7BwzBfzr https://t.co/f9Y0Srcbop
You don’t have to wait for others to save the planet. Join the global movement by taking everyday #ClimateAction ➡️ https://t.co/zTkumwgS40 https://t.co/gkqBVrbFGN

2018 marked the 70th anniversary of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. Get inspired to #StandUp4HumanRights by those who fight for the rights of everyone, everywhere: https://t.co/MKoEDYQLey via @greatbigstory 

 https://t.co/xZ4YUlt23K
https://t.co/3M546ihTzE

What's the Global Compact #ForMigration about and what's in it for you? 

Young people form around the world have the answers. https://t.co/DI4BEQDni8

 https://t.co/Bs3hculbSM

In September, @UNICEF supporters @BTS_twt helped launch the #Youth2030 strategy, calling on young people to speak up for their future. Details from @UNYouthEnvoy: https://t.co/N6W3d8V2Xx #ThisHappened https://t.co/6f8Hnj6dua

The number of people online in Africa is growing exponentially. While in 2005 only 2.1% of the population had internet access, by the end of 2018 it will be over 24%. https://t.co/fGNKgs2Bdi via @ITU #GlobalGoals https://t.co/F5TG9J17n0

"I don’t know where this journey will take me, but I do know this is what I want to do" --- Tommaso Ripani, one of the @UNVolunteers who works with @UNOCHA, enjoys making a real difference in people's lives. https://t.co/o5biVsh1sO https://t.co/XF7aeJKQ4G
Have a look at our latest @instagram story to meet Phyllis, who received the UN Female Police Officer of the Year Award for her work with @UNSomalia ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/iaNtTklFFs

.@UNSMIL strongly condemns attack on Libya's foreign ministry in Tripoli and will continue working with the Libyan people to prevent terrorist groups from turning the country into an arena for their crimes. https://t.co/zB7VXWDdf7
See how our colleagues from @WFP are helping farmers in Sudan make simple changes in crop storage that can go a long way toward #ZeroHunger. https://t.co/gAHExOJ37x #GlobalGoals

In 2018, the UN mourned the loss of former Secretary-General, @KofiAnnan, a 'guiding force for good'. His inspirational legacy carries on in our work every day. https://t.co/wNDfZ2OW7W https://t.co/zxx9J64Qg9
~800,000 people die due to suicide every year. Find out from @WHO what you can do if you think someone is considering suicide: https://t.co/LjJTFsKRJG #Letstalk https://t.co/qnVHhiHHjL

"Refugees have the same rights as everyone else, but also the potential and aspirations to contribute to the communities who welcome them." -- @RefugeesChief. His take on the new Global #RefugeeCompact ⬇️ https://t.co/YO4w5gfGNk

In 2018, @UNPeacekeeping celebrated their 70th anniversary. More than 1M men & women have been #ServingForPeace in 70+ missions. We thank them for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/akuSBqLx5A https://t.co/SExBuUPCkT

We all need to work together to make the #ParisAgreement a reality, Arnold @Schwarzenegger said earlier this month at #COP24. Here's how you can join him in taking #ClimateAction: https://t.co/tmdfYDeMH8 https://t.co/ZYiiow3sAV

Throwback to 2014 when children displaced from their homes by violence and conflict in South Sudan, sang Christmas carols in Juba. Details about @unmissmedia: https://t.co/xFV0qDPxBn https://t.co/sN0qrQGpBv
Meet some of the Swedish peacekeepers who are #ServingForPeace with @UN_MINUSMA in Timbuktu. https://t.co/a9uOqv12aT https://t.co/MIu1faQUOh
Throwback to Dec 2016 when 🎅 hopped on a UN Humanitarian Air Service ✈️ to help @WFP_SouthSudan help those in need. https://t.co/onz1g5PY9W https://t.co/FbOKtgL3V6

Depression can happen to anybody -- and it can be treated.
Find out more from @WHO: https://t.co/wVrUnSBw6j #LetsTalk https://t.co/2Oeb472RHr

Happy Holidays and best wishes from around the UN System and around the world to all our followers!
https://t.co/awXO1aMlED

#UNGA Hall featuring a festive display. 

Merry Christmas to all who are celebrating! https://t.co/sk8qm4B6kL

A high tide warning remains in effect after a tsunami struck coastal areas in Indonesia this weekend, claiming hundreds of lives. The UN stands ready to support the ongoing relief efforts. https://t.co/a1Leo4ytld

This holiday season, see how you can help @UNRWA provide live-saving assistance to Palestine refugees by giving #Gifts4Refugees: https://t.co/EuRgOFDGs1

https://t.co/v3MfsSBETm

🌱 or 🥩?
‘Plant-based meat’ alternatives are a good way of taking #ClimateAction. Find out more in our latest podcast 🎧 https://t.co/gy7Plhl3Yc

🔹 Equal rights
🔹 Non-discrimination
🔹 Tolerance

The values of the UN Charter are principles for us all to live by: https://t.co/MuaDhLz0va https://t.co/7prC582Onx

Every month, humanitarians
🔹bring food to 8M people in Yemen
🔹support 5.4M people with medical assistance & protection in Syria.
And so much more.

Details in the latest Global Humanitarian Overview: https://t.co/2ISEVBhbr4 #InvestinHumanity via @UNOCHA https://t.co/ED5TMhwAkl
Looking to make a difference to the 🌎 but don't know how? Here are some #SustainableSunday ideas: https://t.co/uE8W7SyBk4 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/cbOPDiR7UD

The UN is leading by example on #ClimateAction by

➡️ reducing use of single-use plastics
➡️ cutting back on travel emissions
➡️ reusing, recycling or composting waste

More: https://t.co/CyYIV55D6X  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/TXvZ2PJ5Hk

Humanitarian aid represents a lifeline for millions of people like Ekhlas.
This holiday season, donate & help save lives: https://t.co/W81Ahb0BYh #InvestInHumanity https://t.co/ctVHzhkozw

Congratulations to @RebecaGyumi for winning one of the 2018 @UNhumanrights Prizes.

Follow @UmojaWaMataifa to get the latest UN updates in Kiswahili 

https://t.co/Aeneou2dI5

Every #ClimateAction we take, no matter how small it may seem, matters a lot when many people participate. Open https://t.co/zTkumwytsA to join people around the world in taking daily action & saving our 🌍. https://t.co/J9BU1mQboO

Stop - Prevent - Protect

The UN is working to make zero tolerance for sexual exploitation & abuse a reality. Here's how: https://t.co/G3A62cDLtG https://t.co/lDOcpEfKZI
In Sri Lanka, 90% of women & girls have endured sexual harassment while taking public transport. @UNFPA is working to spread awareness to stop this https://t.co/uQgCNJbEDy https://t.co/fWIXNqEoOz
Interested in applying for UN jobs? Start by searching for job openings on the @UN_Careers portal: https://t.co/5KcULnQla9 https://t.co/RryxmZri9Q
Meet Latty from Burkina Faso, one of the brave women and girls fighting female genital mutilation. Find out from @UNFPA how she advocates to #EndFGM: https://t.co/1s4YuzCsDV https://t.co/jdsrgiBfuJ
The "Knotted Gun" sculpture outside UNHQ in NYC is an inspirational symbol of peace and non-violence. More famous artwork at the UN: https://t.co/sZJ4UJNkpH https://t.co/5uXl5RTRnE
Women are often at high risk from the impacts of climate change -- but are also taking important #ClimateAction. Here's how: https://t.co/HwjqrTOKo6 via @UN_Women https://t.co/CLHh3WNfkH
.@UNHumanRights details “unimaginable horrors” endured by migrants & refugees stranded in Libya while attempting to cross the Mediterranean https://t.co/DgH7vIexZm #WithDignity #StandUp4HumanRights
Achieving the #GlobalGoals will require successful partnerships 🤝between governments, the private sector and civil society. Learn more: https://t.co/YfVJyUiM5L https://t.co/OHUvNjZRcT
Security Council authorized deployment of team to monitor and implement Yemen ceasefire. https://t.co/RAxGaYft89 https://t.co/IkbK337O8w

"Civil society is in danger of being shut out altogether, and international organizations are also struggling to keep operating," UN Human Rights Chief @mbachelet on recent developments in Nicaragua. https://t.co/6AsPUYGCzg

Looking ahead to monsoon season, @UNmigration is using a new bamboo treatment plan to improve living conditions for Rohingya families currently in temporary dwellings in Bangladesh https://t.co/PeIoxkjnXW
Security Council unanimously authorizes deployment of team to monitor and support Yemen ceasefire deal. https://t.co/RAxGaXXSgB

"The true test of reform will be measured in tangible results in the lives of the people we serve – and the trust of those who support our work.” – @antonioguterres on UN Reform. https://t.co/ym7BwzSQqZ https://t.co/PBoeJ7Ukaz

You can now view a trove of recently declassified documents from former Secretary-General @KofiAnnan thanks to a new online platform from UN Archives & @CityCollegeNY. https://t.co/ksFmbeisyA via @UNLibrary https://t.co/ZN2nXxk9Y2

This holiday season, see how you can help @UNRWA provide live-saving assistance to Palestine refugees, and have your donations matched. https://t.co/vELopjMtG5 #DignityIsPriceless

https://t.co/v3MfsSBETm

"Promote human rights in your own spaces." -- Tanzanian education activist @RebecaGyumi, winner of the 2018 @UNHumanRights Prize, encourages everyone to help advance the rights of girls. https://t.co/Lw0COw8Hwl #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/8lg0QN1e59
